value.title: StarCraft 2: The MASS RECALL Mothership Rush!
value.excerpt: Two viewer submitted games of StarCraft 2. The first one is a Diamond League match of Terran versus Protoss featuring some creative Mothership plays, and the second is... a disaster of unranked Zerg vs Protoss. value.title: StarCraft 2: The NEW World Champion vs herO, the BEST Protoss! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of high level StarCraft 2 between Oliveira (Terran) and herO (Protoss). While herO has been more succesful over the last few years, Oliveira recently won IEM Katowice and is therefore the current StarCraft 2 World Champion. value.title: How to beat the 1v7 INSANE AI Challenge (no, Beastyqt has not done it) #2 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I have challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 Random INSANE Cheater AIs at once! Serral has said it is impossible unless maybe they're all Zergs. After Spirit (Soul) tried it first, the next person brave enough to try it is PiLiPiLi, a Protoss player. He took on 7 Random insane AIs all on Any Build.
